channel.title: Camtasia, Hypercam, or other? Which is fastest with high quality?
channel.description: i am looking for a good video capturing program. i have camtasia, but i am wondering if hypercam is faster, or if any1 knows of a faster one that does not take away from quality recording. thanks!

item.title: Camtasia, Hypercam, or other? Which is fastest with high quality?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

i use “gotcha!” and dorgem or sumthin liek that, course i also use a ps2 eyetoy instead of a real webcam so yea…

item.title: Camtasia, Hypercam, or other? Which is fastest with high quality?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Camtasia all the way.

If you save it in an .avi format, it has no quality loss but high in space.
